description: ***NOTICE OF PROPOSED PROCUREMENT RIMP W8485-247839/B", with the following items: Pack And Harness Assy Parachute.",
full_summary:
===============

### Tender Announcement

#### Title
Pack and Harness Assy Parachute

#### Reference Number
CB-858-43094662

#### Solicitation Number
W8485-247839/B

#### Tender Closing Date
November 22, 2023, 14:00:00

#### Procurement Overview
The Department of National Defence is issuing a tender notice to procure Pack and Harness Assy Parachute assemblies. The successful bidder will be required to deliver the items to the specified depot as soon as possible.

#### Items Required
- Item 1: Pack and Harness Assy Parachute (GSIN: 1670, NSN: 1670-20-009-4521)
	* Part Number: 8927592-2
	* NCAGE: 36376
	* Quantity: 30
	* Unit of Issue: Each
	* Delivery Location: 15 Westwin Ave, FCA Free Carrier

#### Tender Details
- Mode of procurement: Competitive - Open bidding
- Procurement method: Tender notice
- Language of Tender: English and French

#### Preference and Clauses
- A preference will be given to Canadian goods and/or services
- The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement

#### Contact Information
- Ryan Duncan, Contract Officer
	* Email: [ryan.duncan@forces.gc.ca](mailto:ryan.duncan@forces.gc.ca)
	* Phone: (613) 262-9650

#### Tender Documents
- Tender notice documents can be downloaded from [canadabuys.canada.ca](http://canadabuys.canada.ca) by following the links to the tender notice
- Documents are available in both English and French

#### Requirements for Equivalent or Substitute Products
- Bidders proposing an equivalent or substitute product must indicate the part number and NCAGE of the product offered.  Product substitution is permitted with the agency's consent.
